lender.name: Onno
lender.loan_because: To help people in remote and difficult circumstances achieve their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I manage communities in the computer and software industry to bring companies, individuals and institutes together to collaborate on projects of mutual interest.

lender.name: Araxi Photography
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wedding and portrait photographer based in Los Angeles California.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can.........YOU GET OUT OF IT, WHAT YOU PUT INTO IT!!!
lender.occupational_info: I've retired from the music business, and the construction business. And now spend my days trying to connect with people, around the world. PEACE BROTHER.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I want to see women succeed worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses grow through good marketing and sales tactics.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I hang out on the internets

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I want to honor the memory of Don Thompson, who had an entrepreneurial spirit and a warm and generous heart. I want to honor the memory of Jeanne Cuenot, a lovely and vibrant young woman, who was loved by family and friends.
lender.occupational_info: I produce product literature for a scientific/biotechnology company.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: there's nothing more gratifying than helping someone realize their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 8th grade language arts at a public middle school in southern California.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: it is a chance to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital, providing imaging services.

lender.name: Georgia & Ira
lender.loan_because: I care about others. I hope that this money gives the recipients hope for their future.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: It is a chance to help people improve their lives and the lives of those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I was a elementary teacher in inner city schools. I also taught ceramics, GED courses and home landscaping. I have been a writer and editor for an web site. Currently, I am a master gardener in my community, and I volunteer through the county agricultural extension service. I also tutor in No Child Left Behind and for individual students.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it's one way to demonstrate global citizenship
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer systems and people to solve business problems.

lender.name: Sandra and Diane
lender.loan_because: We are all connected.

lender.name: Manjeet
lender.loan_because: How could I not do something to lend a hand?

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help sometimes. I sure do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school English teacher by day and a singer - songwriter by night.

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: I want people to reach their goal in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a tech support for business service in a large company.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I can! That's it in a nutshell.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of employees. I make sure that they are able to do their jobs to the best of their abilities and are treated fairly by the company.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: The sum is greater than the parts. I like to think I can make small moves to improve the world..
lender.occupational_info: I teach teenagers with learning disabilities.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Seeing someone trying to better their lives and the lives of those around them inspires me.
lender.occupational_info: I help the doctor take care of animals in need of medical treatment.

lender.name: Tene
lender.loan_because: Why Not??... I would rather help someone who will better themselves then buy coffee at Starbucks for the next 5 days. And I have to off set my need to do something for humanity that Im not getting from work.
lender.occupational_info: I help make environments look more appealing while creating organization. What I do is not essential to life nor does it give back to man in any way shape or form. For that in my personal life I give back to the community as much as possible.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I can and therefore I should

lender.name: Angelina
lender.loan_because: I am incredibly blessed to have a healthy child, a supportive husband, a challenging career in the world's finest Navy, an "advanced" education, and a cottage craft business of my very own. I want others to have the same opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: As a mother and wife, I hold my family together. As an attorney in the world's finest Navy, I strive to change the world, one person at a time. Although it's hard to hold on to those ideals at times, that's still my goal. As an artist, I use yarn and a hook to unwind from the rigidity of my career and the chaos of life. I am blessed that others find pleasure in the things I make.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I think that Kiva is a great way to invest in other people's dreams and support social entrepreneurship on an accessible level. It's a great feeling to work in solidarity with others through small, but amazing projects for change.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a healthy grocery store in the wellness/herbal supplements area.

lender.name: Lollie
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with the resources and opportunities to conquer my passions, I want others to have the same.
lender.occupational_info: I work on Microsoft events for Worldwide Public Sector group.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: it's easy to do and helps people help themselves... AND the money goes where YOU say it goes.

lender.name: Thiébaut
lender.occupational_info: Creating computer software.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It's a hand-up, rather than a hand-out
lender.occupational_info: I help international students get a good education

lender.name: goodness
lender.loan_because: i love you all.i love you alli love you alli love you alli love you all
lender.occupational_info: oki love you alli love you alli love you alli love you alli love you alli love you alli love you alli love you all

lender.name: Andrew Rendel
lender.loan_because: it's sustainable and supports people trying to support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I calculate the risk of people not paying back my company and decide whether to offer them loans!

lender.name: ken
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me by salvation through faith and trust in His Son, Jesus Christ , his death on the cross and His being raised from the dead as full payment for my sins and the sins of anyone who will believe, and my blessing are to be shared with others.

lender.name: itay
lender.loan_because: it helps people world wide
lender.occupational_info: medical simulations to help doctors

lender.name: Team Hoffman
lender.loan_because: We love sharing

lender.name: Tracie
lender.loan_because: everyone should have an opportunity to do well and support their family.

lender.name: Niko
lender.loan_because:
Giving back to the community that has given me so much... and it makes me feel better.
And by lending I am a part of helping the people provide for themselves.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: It seems fun
lender.occupational_info: I do the book-keeping for an IT company

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: I am a mother of two children and want to help other women in less fortunate circumstances help their children to enjoy a bright future.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: I wish to help others who are prepared to work to support themselves & provide a service to their immediate community.
lender.occupational_info: I own a bookshop in a small country town. I started 28 years ago with very little money, but now can live quite comfortably.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a helping hand.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people support themselves as they pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help people connect with God and themselves through the practice of yoga.

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: We are one big world!
lender.occupational_info: Handling only zeros and ones, nothing real

lender.name: Brett & Danielle
lender.loan_because: WE loan because we have all gone through tough times, and we remember those where every little bit helps. Here is a little bit to help out.
lender.occupational_info: Brett work with middle income families on insurance benefits. When something happens to thier families they are protected for the future. Danielle takes care of Shasta (family Boston Terrier) and attends school!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe that one person can make a difference.

lender.name: Mlolongo family
lender.occupation: 1 writer/ 1 football coach/ lots of kids
lender.loan_because: we want to help
lender.occupational_info: I write books and my husband coaches football

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: To steal a quote from Lord of the Rings ... "even the smallest person can change the course of the future"
lender.occupational_info: I get people and parts transported around the world

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I think financial services should be available those who can benefit from them

lender.name: Nguyen
lender.loan_because: i want to made a website for trade of hand-made from Vietnam to Japan. I wish i will loan about 1500$. Thanks
lender.occupational_info: I'm 30 years old. I'm salesman, I live in Vietnam

lender.name: Herring Family
lender.loan_because: We care about helping others.

lender.name: István
lender.loan_because: because even "small drops" will make a change, and if I have what others need more urgently, why not share it with them?
lender.occupational_info: try to educate young adults to get more health conscious and also to gain a holistic view on nature and natural occurrences, so that one day they may become better medical doctors

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe in microlending. Kiva is a great place to easily help other life entrepreneurs around the world that are not that fortunate to live in the so-called developed world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a marketer and enterprise 2.0 consultant for a leading cloud computing consultancy in Zurich.

lender.name: JPD
lender.loan_because: If helping others fulfill their ideas to build a more prosperous livelihood can be achieved by someone ready to free up some otherwise frivolously spent extra cash, so be it. My guilt is your building block. Onward!

lender.name: Hoff
lender.loan_because: I'm a human. We're supposed to do good things. My wife, 3 young children and I are fortunate to be healthy and happy and we think others should have that opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: My work pales in comparison to the wonderful people doing good across the world like those in the field who help get these loans to the people who need them. My job? Is to contribute as I can...

lender.name: Zsuzsanna & Lorand
lender.loan_because: I believe in "What goes around comes around" and helping small entrepreneurs may break the poverty cycle, one day...
lender.occupational_info: Managing different products from manufacturing to sales.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to support people who want to improve their own life.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I love helping people who want to help themselves and others!! By paying back your loan we can help more and more people every day. We are all brothers and sisters no matter race, religion, or creed.
lender.occupational_info: I travel the world for a living connecting with people all over the world. You will find me in the US, Europe, Middle East.

lender.name: Tawana
lender.loan_because: It's great to help someone achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I assist to achieve the goal of home ownership, relocation or to sell property.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Bailey
lender.loan_because: We like to help others, help themselves.

lender.name: Ajay
lender.loan_because:
I strongly believe that micro-lending is a very good and sustainable way of helping to solve poverty in the world.
A small business/enterprise not only provides income for the owner but also helps the community around.

lender.name: Becca RB
lender.loan_because: Sharing what you have is a key to good living!

lender.name: Mark Schoen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of many people talking small steps together for peace and social justice.
lender.occupational_info: I help maintain the accounting records for Seattle University, a Jesuit Catholic university in Seattle, Washington, USA

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: This past year I was the producer on a documentary on micro financing and learned and saw first hand how much this model inpacts lives.
lender.occupational_info: I make films.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I lived in Uganda for a year and I know how big a difference a small loan can make.
lender.occupational_info: I make stuff! Videos, paintings, sculptures...

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: it brings joy

lender.name: NewMediaDrive
lender.loan_because: It's important to help other entrepreneurs better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We're a digital design company with a strong sense of community.

lender.name: Nick
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy houses.

lender.name: SirChirol
lender.loan_because: I have visited over 30 countries and have seen how people can help themselves when they have the opportunity. I want to help give them one. Foreign policy is very important to me and I feel it is important to have a personal stake in that by helping improve places like Iraq and Afghanistan. and supporting US policies.

lender.name: Celeste
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Shana
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great idea to help those in need and Kiva is a great way to do just that.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: As an American Christian I belive that all who can help others must help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach physics and computer programming in the local public high school.

lender.name: Cookie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: darthgirl
lender.loan_because: we can and we should

lender.name: Joya
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help getting started.
lender.occupational_info: I help others make smart business decisions.

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because: I am a Backpacker and recieved help during my journeys, also from poor people - now I want to give this help back.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: People have given to me when I was in need. I am happy to do the same for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I write, record, and perform music.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I like to help others!

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I have been given a lot by strangers and this is one way to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a doctor in the emergency room.

lender.name: Harry M
lender.loan_because: It is better to give than to receive
lender.occupational_info: I help people start their own business.

lender.name: Janette
lender.loan_because: I feel the need to reach out and help others. I read up on this organization and beleive they are doing a wonderful thing for woman across the world.

lender.name: Ella
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Bob & Patsy
lender.loan_because: we like to help those trying to help themselves make a better life
lender.occupational_info: helping others improve their environment through artistic and scientific design

lender.name: Blanca
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I believe in giving opportunities, in dreams and hard work. I also believe in loans and not donations. It empowers and builds self-esteem.
lender.occupational_info: I own a spa where we provide massages, facials and other services to help people relax.

lender.name: Timothee M
lender.loan_because: I'm glad to help some people needing money to innovate and improve their lives. I believe in entrepreneurship, i believe in self motivating against toughness.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the IT field, but behind that, information technology helps people to connect, and it is one of the most interesting thing in life.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to assist women in third world countries to become financially independent.
lender.occupational_info: I no longer work, and am retired, but I was once a Financial Manager in many different organisations.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: it's an ingenious way to help people empower themselves!

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: Give some one a fish and you feed them for a day. Teach them to fish and you feed them for a lifetime. God has given me so much in my life, I just want to give some back.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I feel that we all have the power to make a difference. These loans are only $25 dollars, but they allow the recipiants to be $25 dollars closer to achieving a brighter future!!!
lender.occupational_info: My job is to be educated in the school system. I hope to one day educate others who are less fortunate

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I would like to give a helping hand to someone who just need a little assistance to help themselves.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: ...it's a responsibility as well as a desire of mine. To me, it's clearly the right thing to do.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to make life better for their families, their community and themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help banks to implement information technology used to provide services to bank staff and bank customers.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can so I should!

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I think ambition should be met with opportunity.

lender.name: Conor
lender.loan_because: My dad, an active member on Kiva, introduced me to the organization. I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: College Student

lender.name: Shea
lender.loan_because: Galatians 6:7: "Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
lender.occupational_info: I deal in the everyday restaurant operations from running and managing shifts to ordering for a million dollar store, or interviews of potential employees.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to help others. Americans have so much to give. I'd like to share my blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I sell Insurance and Financial plans.

lender.name: Kellie
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to have advantages not available to some other people in this world, and would like to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mum number one, and this will always come first. I worked as a Social Worker for 6 years with abused and disadvantaged young people. I am currently undertaking a Graduate Degree to become a secondary teacher, and hope to combine my social work and teaching skills.

lender.name: scar
lender.loan_because: The Way to Be Happy is to Make Others Happy.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: Just to help out.
lender.occupational_info: I make art jewelry.

lender.name: Muhammad Ilyas
lender.loan_because: Medicine
lender.occupational_info: Pharmaccy Manager

lender.name: Austinn
lender.loan_because: I Love to help people .
lender.occupational_info: I Love school and learning, but mostly playing with my friends.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: We all wish to honor the memory of Kathy Atkinson. To our family she was our mother, wife, and grandmother. Through Kiva, we want to allow her generosity, strong faith, and kindness to spread to different people all over the world.

lender.name: Seana
lender.loan_because: I believe that we should all start from an equal playing field.
lender.occupational_info: Being in a position to lend a little money to people who can make their lives better as a result is a huge high.

lender.name: nicola
lender.loan_because: we are one famely
lender.occupational_info: praying to god , and tell peopel from god

lender.name: Levi
lender.loan_because: I know this is crazy, but I live in the same town as the man I'm living to, down the street from the BRAC office. I started lending with Kiva before I left the first world, and now it's fun to do it with people I can actually meet.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Hope Destitute Children's Centre, a project supporting destitute and street children, doing fundraising, communication with foreign sponsors, policy creation, design work, teaching, spending time with the kids, facilitating meetings, and a very big ETC.

lender.name: Chi
lender.loan_because: 100$ in some countries are more worth than in others.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: It's a small thing for me, but a big thing for someone who needs it. I have been waiting to get to know an organisation like this for years.

lender.name: titaniumhijau
lender.loan_because: I love to help people.
lender.occupational_info: Just love to work anywhere in this world. Thats why i'm freeman. Freelancer!

lender.name: Luke and Charlotte
lender.loan_because: We support economic and social justice as part of a complete diet of spiritual practice.
lender.occupational_info: We fix people's computers. But we also have a non-profit that lends books, shows movies and hosts Symposiums all in the service of increasing community mental and physical health and a healthy environment. We have just started two new businesses - Rainbow Fair Trade Handicrafts and Rainbow Green Services

lender.name: RAV - Besancon
lender.loan_because: We are a small wine tasting and buying association. Most of the little money we make is investied in Kiva.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I believe that you need to sow what you want to reap. I am part of a loving family, have never wanted for anything, have always been safe, secure and loved. I feel an absolute need to give back so that others can be as blessed as I am.

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because: I care about the world you and me live in.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work as a conservation manager in a nature reserve in the Netherlands. I'm also the founder of a consultanty network taking on environmental & conservation issues. We invest some of our financial assets through kiva.org

lender.name: ROOTS
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of freelance consultants, focusing on environmental and sustainability issues. A part of our financial assets is invested through kiva.org

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: My pleasure and my responsibility.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: we need to change poverty and the federal government of the USA is not spending my tax dollars like I believe they should, so I am doing my part to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school science teacher in the greater Phoenix Area in Arizona, USA. I work hard to educate my students about the world around them.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I want to share my abundance with those less fortunate.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Give to the World!!! Love the World!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a artist I Draw, Paint, Sculpt, Animate, and build puppets.

lender.name: Matthias
lender.loan_because: I like to have a good feeling about being on this planet and doing something good for other people equal where they are. It is the job of the people who had more luck to help others to let their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I have a shop for spirituell products and I have my own. I do marketing, selling and all this business stuff, but what I like the most, is to talk to my customers in the Lichtschloss. I left my job as an engineer to open my eyes for the problems of mankind and I try to help a little bit.

lender.name: Ada
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to directly improve the lives of industrious people in third world countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help people sell and purchase homes.

lender.name: BBHL
lender.loan_because: I think the best part about having the little that I can give is using it to help others.It is such a blessing to be able to help others.

lender.name: Andria
lender.loan_because: I think it's a marvelous way to help people make better (safer, healthier, more prosperous) lives for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an agency that learns if a youth involved in our juvenile justice system (for commiting crimes) need help with depression or alcohol/drug abuse or other mental health problems. So if there is a problem, then this youth can get the help he needs.

lender.name: Stella
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed in so many ways. I would like to share my blessings with others. It takes so little to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work part time helping in an office and part time at home as a mom.

lender.name: AVO MARKET
lender.loan_because: AVO wants to keep market culture alive
lender.occupational_info: Using street markets as a way to explore, share and create dialogues about cultures around the world.

lender.name: Rebekah
lender.loan_because: I cannot help but share God's love and mercy with other people.
lender.occupational_info: I attend Columbia University in New York City, but my home is in Austin, Texas. At Columbia, I will hopefully be studying English, Theatre, and Italian.

lender.name: Tapio
lender.loan_because: I think that we who have been lucky should try help others as well. Simple as that.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a big Nordic bank and try to make sure that our staff have all the information they need to do the work and serve our customers.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: My life has been blessed beyond belief. What else can I do but give?

lender.name: Tom and Tina
lender.loan_because: we believe that the solution to misery within and without our community here is to aid people to sustain themselves...'teach a man to fish'
lender.occupational_info: i work in the semiconductor manufacturing industry, fabricating microelectronics used in a wide variety of electronic devices.

lender.name: Hyun
lender.loan_because: I always wanted to help and this is such a great way to start. I also love the fact that we can meet (sort of) and get to know the people.
lender.occupational_info: I work at DC Shoes (division of Quiksilver) and write corporate reports. I also troubleshoot software issues with users.

lender.name: Model Metrics
lender.loan_because: As part of Model Citizen, Model Metrics’ ongoing corporate giving initiative, Model Metrics contributes 1% of our employees' time, 1% profits and strives to be one with the earth. Since we were founded in 2003 with an entrepreneurial spirit, we have been fortunate to grow very rapidly. We want to give back to other business owners around the world.
lender.occupational_info: 100% focus on Cloud Computing Consulting. Platform expertise includes salesforce.com, Amazon Web Services, Google, Adobe, Apple 8+ years experience working with leading cloud companies 1,200+ Implementations of Cloud based technologies 150+ employees with industry leading certification and experience credentials Salesforce.com Premier Partner and one of only Three Salesforce Authorized Training Centers for North America Headquartered in Chicago with offices in Atlanta, Detroit, Los Angeles, Minneapolis, New York, Portland, San Francisco, Denver, and Seattle 1/1/1 Model for Giving

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: i support people with learning disabilities to live independently

lender.name: deb
lender.loan_because: We can spend $25 on carry out food. If $25 will help someone's life I am honored to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital.

lender.name: Gurpal Dosanjh
lender.loan_because: investing in people provides the greatest returns
lender.occupational_info: I crunch numbers

lender.name: Alana
lender.loan_because: I've gone on medical relief trips to Ghana and have seen how a little bit of help can change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I just graduated from college and am applying to medical school. I'd like to do emergency medicine.

lender.name: Omolola
lender.loan_because: Being from a developing country myself, I understand what a huge difference a small loan can make.
lender.occupational_info: In a nutshell, I find ways to use computers and new computing methods to help physicians and other health professionals do their job better (my field is called biomedical informatics)

lender.name: lidija
lender.loan_because: I admire the courage of people working on improving their own future.
lender.occupational_info: I work in administration, finance, and communications, along with a bit of design on the side.

lender.name: Katelyn
lender.loan_because: I'm fighting poverty. One person at a time. I'm fulfilling dreams.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: Be a lamp, or a lifeboat, or a ladder. Help someone's soul heal. Walk out of your house like a shepherd. -Jalaluddin Rumi, poet and mystic (1207-1273)
lender.occupational_info: My spiritual practice includes teaching and nurturing high school students. I am blessed.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Jesus is my financial adviser.
lender.occupational_info: Every day, I try to make people excited about math and that sort of thing.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to assist individuals by giving them access to capital for their businesses with the hope that their success leads them out of, or keeps them from, poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Retired banker

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: The world is a small place.

lender.name: Andras
lender.loan_because: our friend, John, the best tuk-tuk driver in Siem Riep, Cambodia, showed us how small businesses give the best hope for development.

lender.name: John Patrick
lender.loan_because: of the need financially. I am planning to buy a computer so that I could do lay-outing works so that I could earn money for my studies and to help my family

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.occupational_info: I write in my computer or my blog in internet and go on..writng...writing...writing....writing.... to reach in finished in a book and sell for children in the world

lender.name: Sierra Visher
lender.loan_because: I'm a Former Kiva Fellow! I feel a real need to promote the idea of a global community and think that Kiva is a wonderful marriage of personal and financial connections.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Masters student of Public Administration hoping to work in international development

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus!
lender.occupational_info: I teach music to children in kindergarten through 8th grade.

lender.name: bian
lender.loan_because: I come from a rural students, because some incidents in the home, school funding needs

lender.name: Tangos
lender.loan_because: I believe micro-credit can change world.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy.

lender.name: Laurent Condon
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance can make a difference in Africa.

lender.name: Kirsty
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the chance to own their own business and have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I market other people's products on the internet.

lender.name: Nicki (KF9)
lender.loan_because: i've now seen first hand that microfinance can work....under the right conditions!
lender.occupational_info:
I worked with Kiva for 6 months as a Kiva Fellow in Senegal between December 2009 and April 2010. Before that I was working as a management consultant advising on business strategies.
Having got a taste of microfinance 'in the field' I am currently pursuing a Masters degree in Development Studies and hope to continue to work in the sector.

lender.name: marina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference even though its on a smaller scale.

lender.name: Jutta
lender.loan_because: I am glad that I am able to. Money is like energy - it should flow.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business in prepress.

lender.name: Nina & Ron
lender.loan_because: To help people to live their dreams and give them the opportunity to work what they want to.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is a tremendous opportunity to give resources to people who are hard working and desire to make their lives better. I also think Jessica Flannery is a modern day hero.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying business to help people learn how to invest for the future.

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people and make a difference in their lives

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: We have been so blessed and we want to share that with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife and mother. My husband is in sales and marketing.

lender.name: Bahadour
lender.loan_because: it makes sense

lender.name: Bartek
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Consultant

lender.name: Michal
lender.loan_because: Because I was born in the poor and non-free country, and now I live in a prosperous country, without even moving. Unfortunately, not everyone had such good luck.
lender.occupational_info: Working as a manager in the company, which deals with the media audience research and development software.

lender.name: McGinnis
lender.loan_because: we want to help and encourage creative entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of middle schoolers in the United States learning about the world.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the individual. Solutions to global poverty already exist--by harnessing the power of the market and individual initiative people can help one another to make real change.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I am the author of Zigzag Men, a novel about helicopter flying in the Vietnam war.

lender.name: Claus and Swantje
lender.loan_because: We want to do our little part to support enterpreneurs who have the strenghts but not the recources.
lender.occupational_info: We both are in the sporting goods industry. Our hobby became our life and we are involved in creating and selling sporting goods.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I really believe in the mission of Kiva. I'm a recent college graduate and can only make a small loan, but I think every little bit counts!

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I have the resources to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school kids about economics, government and history.

lender.name: Arvin
lender.loan_because: It's good to give :)

lender.name: Karine
lender.loan_because: it is easy and it can actually change lives

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: How could I not?

lender.name: Meridith
lender.loan_because: It might spark peace and prosperity. But at the very least, it makes a positive difference for someone working to improve her life. And how could you say no to that?
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell souvenirs. On kind of a large scale.

lender.name: The Bakke family
lender.loan_because: I want to help others around the world. Help them reach their goals and find their place in life which they were meant to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired and I love to paint and be with my family and I love to help others.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way for individuals to make a real impact on reducing poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I'm doing a degree in urban planning, so I'm interested in improving the quality of people's lives through strengthening communities and community organizations.

lender.name: Helena
lender.loan_because: It's a small step for each of us but a huge step for those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a public company, from the Lisbon's Municipality, dealing with cultural management.

lender.name: Alex & Anne
lender.loan_because: We care!
lender.occupational_info: Alex - high school student Anne - sales representative for a cable company

lender.name: Raphael
lender.occupation: Entrepreneur and Marketing Assistant at BR Telecom

lender.name: wereldwinkel
lender.occupational_info: We are a FairTrade shop run by volunteers. The money we earn we want to spend according our objectives

lender.name: Hannah and Mark
lender.loan_because: We know it is a great way to help people!
lender.occupational_info: As an Account Manager I make sure our clients like our products and know how to use them. As a Financial Analyst, Mark decides the prices and does research to make financial decisions for the company.

lender.name: Derwin
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Very fulfilling! I love where I work and I love what I do. :)

lender.name: Brad & Kathryn
lender.loan_because: A little goes a long way.

lender.name: Amy & Tom
lender.loan_because: we have been fortunate in our lives, and want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Amy works to get new drugs approved and available to those who need them; Tom designs systems for companies to store their information.

lender.name: Island Women
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can and it feels right.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of women mostly from New England who gather once a year on an island in Maine. We all work in professions that attempt to create a happier safer world for all.

lender.name: reglindis
lender.loan_because: my son and his wife surprised me with a gift certificate,

lender.name: miriam
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to help.

lender.name: Lisa T (for the 32)
lender.loan_because: The world supported the Virginia Tech Community after the events of April 16, 2007. Through Kiva - we continue to honor those we lost by supporting hard-working people throughout the world. Thank you!

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: through my travels I see how everyone, regardless of where you reside, is connected.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work for a global retailer which has significant impact on communities throughout the world.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I can, and it's worth doing something to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people identify for themselves how they can improve the way they manage their organisations.

lender.name: Ute
lender.loan_because: Because a little help is better than none.
lender.occupational_info: I want to help women to become independent

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: Because if we don't , who will?
lender.occupational_info: I make short films.

lender.name: Dirk
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: internet design, advertising.

lender.name: Elizabeth and Jeff
lender.loan_because: I think women having their own business is empowering. I thoroughly endorse the entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from the construction industry. Now volunteer at the Alliance Française in Chicago.

lender.name: Rich and Lana
lender.occupation: Both retired: elections clerk & news officer
lender.loan_because: we believe we're all in this together.

lender.name: Geetha
lender.occupational_info: I help to manufacture soaps and cleaners.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Governments helping people never seems to work. People helping people works.
lender.occupational_info: I set up and maintain information technology machines for legal firms.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people help themselves and those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student going into 7th grade at Catholic School.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur I know how vital access to capital can be. Such access can be extremely limited for small borrowers who may have little or no credit history or business experience. Given a chance, most of these small borrowers will succeed, and I'm grateful I'm able to help make these folks' dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I owned and operated a retail photography equipment and supplies store until I retired.

lender.name: Eddi ;-)
lender.loan_because: weil es spaß macht menschen zu helfen :-)

lender.name: ken
lender.loan_because: only a life lived for others is a life worthwile - a. einstein
lender.occupational_info: writing computer programs

lender.name: Sean & Meghan
lender.loan_because: ...for reasons political, social, economic, but most importantly, spiritual. Christ has blessed us (not to mention the rest of the U.S.) with more than we could ever need. For this, we share...
lender.occupational_info: Chemical Engineer (him) Electronic Media & ART+Design (her)

lender.name: Tim, Meg, Scout, Quinn
lender.loan_because: "Man should not consider his material possessions his own, but as common to all, so as to share them without hesitation when others are in need." St. Thomas Aquinas
lender.occupational_info: We are teachers who are trying to bring awareness of the world to our students and parents who are trying to do the same with our children.

lender.name: Omar Rezec
lender.loan_because: I want to positively impact the human condition in the world and make the world a better place.

lender.name: Sarah Ivey
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all live in one world.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses advertise to people in the right places at the right times.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We want to help entreprenuers whom need a break and poor people have a real chance to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Work in an office most of the time, in finance and real estate

lender.name: John & Cindy
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage the growth and development of people around the world.

lender.name: Vikram Shenoy
lender.occupational_info: Startup guy

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage telecommunication projects across Australia.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I've overcome the financial challenges of divorce and job lay offs, and the fear of not having enough. I loan to help others achieve financial security and the great feeling of personal accomplishment of their goals.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: if I were the one who needed the loan, I know you would lend to me.

lender.name: Tzedakahman
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Everyone deserves the opportunity to make a living with dignity and honor.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a social network that is designed to empower the next generation to learn and experience the giving of charity, from a meaningful perspective, based on Jewish values as we all learn to become more thoughtful in our relationships to society.

lender.name: Matt, Deb, Sam & Bianca
lender.loan_because: It makes us happy to see others pursue dreams which are otherwise beyond reach.
lender.occupational_info: Matt - Police Officer; Deb - Biosecurity Officer; Sam - 10yrs, Bianca -8yrs, both at school.
